game_description: The World's First Manga Platform for Enjoying Japanese Manga Comics in VR Features. The position and size of the manga can be changed freely. You can switch between various backgrounds in the reading space. You can add new manga in the VR space. You can add new comics in the VR space - Can be used offline (need to download comics in advance) Cominavi account is required. For details, please check (https://mechacomi.jp/).
review_1: I liked the different 360 environments, and the whole package is generous.
review_2: The Japanese comics are extremely high resolution and you can easily move them around a simple stereoscopic 3d environment. Its all in Japanese but it was still cool to look at the pictures. Well made app, I doubt it ever gets English but a man can dream.
